      • getMatchBracket

        public int getMatchBracket(int round,
                           int matchNumber)
        getMatchBracket This method returns whether the match with the inputted round and match number is in the winners or losers bracket
        Specified by:
        getMatchBracket in class Bracket
        Parameters:
        round, - An integer that represents the round number of the match being searched for
        matchNumber, - An integer that represents the match number of the match being searched for
        Returns:
        0, since any match in a single elimination bracket is in the winner's bracket
